name: 麦迪逊·汉默
introduction: Madison Elizabeth Hammer, born May 5, 1999, is an American actress and model. Madison is best known for her role on Nickelodeon's "Drama Club". Madison started her career in 2019 when she began training in Buffalo, NY. It wasn't until 2021 that Madison made it onto set by booking her role in the Netflix Limited Series "True Story". Since then, Madison has worked on many different reputable productions. Madison's determination, hard work, and passion will lead her into an incredibly successful career.
